metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6817 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In WordPress before 4.7.3 (wp-includes/embed.php), there is authenticated Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in YouTube URL Embeds.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6817` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyone - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentythree - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentytwo - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.7.3+dfsg-1').
